name: Alta Vista School
description: Serves: K - 8. Fee based private school. Tuition Assistance An independent Junior Kindergarten through 8th grade progressive school based in San Francisco, AVS prepares students to thrive as creative thinkers, innovators, and catalysts for positive change in the world.
